amendment.description: Amendment reduces the amount provided for the Botanic Garden by $3,166,946, to the fiscal year 2014 level and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-426 to reduce the amount provided for the Botanic Garden to the fiscal year 2014 level and transfer the funds to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 198 (Roll no. 189).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 198 (Roll no. 189).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
